title: Investigating child maltreatment
description: This tipsheet provides information and guidance on investigating child maltreatment, including federal laws and regulations, and strategies for obtaining records and interviewing sources. It covers topics such as the Federal Child Abuse Prevention and Treatment Act (CAPTA) and how to use FOIA to obtain relevant documents.
